case.title: Looking for LTR London SE , Eltham , Mottingham - 43 (South East London)
case.text:
I'm not good at describing myself nor what I want in my life partner .
I'm new comer to UK, feel so lonely AboutMe M,divorced , no kids,-43yr-177cm , average body , mixed , no-disease , clean ,non drinker , non smoker , university-degree . Very-emotional person .
LookingFor :- F, below43 , graduated , emotional , honest ,non drinker , not in any relationship ( single , divorced , widow ) . living in London ( preferred at SE , Eltham , Mottingham ) , Looking for LTR not casual .
Please talk about yourself so I know u are real person .. I'm real and serious Please send me your pictures I'll send mine ..
